entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
